channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Should Art Be Regulated by the SEC?’: NFT Artists’ New Lawsuit Seeks Answers
item.description: At issue is whether digital collectibles can be considered a security. “What the SEC has done directly affects my ability to make a living,” one plain...

item.title: Loft Orbital forms joint venture with UAE-based firm to scale satellite production in the Middle East
item.description: A holding company affiliated with an Emirati royal family is injecting a new joint venture between Abu Dhabi-based Marlan Space and startup Loft Orbit...

item.title: Pavel Durov's Arrest Leaves Telegram Hanging in the Balance
item.description: Durov has reportedly been detained in France over Telegram's alleged failure to adequately moderate illegal content on the messaging app. His arrest s...

item.title: In 2024, it really is better to run a startup in San Francisco, according to data and founders who’ve relocated
item.description: San Francisco’s AI startup boom is so big, even international founders who don’t run AI startups are relocating there to help their companies grow, ac...

item.title: Samsung Odyssey G6 OLED Review: More Frames Than Your Eye Can Handle
item.description: At 360 frames per second, the Samsung Odyssey G6 OLED is fast enough to show me just how bad I really am at Overwatch 2.

item.title: Y Combinator backs its first defense startup, Ares Industries
item.description: The first defense startup to receive backing from Y Combinator, Ares Industries, launched earlier this week. In a post on the YC website, the startup ...

item.title: Klaris Clear Ice Maker Review: A Worthy Investment to Up Your Home Bartending Game
item.description: This appliance may seem inefficient, but it’s actually one of the best ways to achieve clear ice at home.

item.title: Telegram founder Pavel Durov arrested in France
item.description: Pavel Durov, founder and CEO of messaging app Telegram, was arrested on Saturday evening while leaving his private jet at France’s Le Bourget airport,...

item.title: ‘Unprecedented Times’ Is the New Normal
item.description: The phrase has become a convenient descriptor for an increasingly inconvenient future.

item.title: The Port of Seattle and Sea-Tac Airport say they’ve been hit by ‘possible cyberattack’
item.description: The Port of Seattle, which also operates the Seattle-Tacoma International Airport, said it was hit with a “possible cyberattack” that appeared to affe...
